function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk for SARS-CoV-2 outbreaks in workplaces including hospitals, nursing homes, manufacturing, meatpacking, and office settings.","Impact":"Spread of COVID-19 within workplaces leading to illness, absenteeism, and potential community transmission.","Mitigation":"Timely and effective infection prevention and control measures, including education initiatives, public engagement in contact tracing, and precise environmental conditions.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, contact tracing apps, and environmental monitoring devices.","People":"Healthcare and social care workers, essential workers in retail, education, construction, transportation, and manufacturing settings.","Owner":"Healthcare administrators, workplace managers, public health authorities."},{"Description":"Lack of high-quality evidence on effective workplace COVID-19 IPC measures in under-studied and highly positive regions such as Central-South America and South Asia.","Impact":"Vulnerability of workers in less wealthy countries to COVID-19 outbreaks and inadequate protection measures.","Mitigation":"Conducting research on effective IPC measures in under-studied regions, sharing knowledge from developed countries, and providing support for implementation.","Technologies":"Research partnerships, knowledge sharing platforms, telemedicine for support and implementation.","People":"Workers in under-studied regions, public health researchers, international organizations.","Owner":"International research organizations, public health institutions, governments."}]}
